prompt:
How did you help improve a customer experience recently? Explain the situation and your actions.
A customer contacted me about a problem with their order, and I realized that there was a miscommunication in the instructions they received. To address this issue, I immediately reached out to the customer service team and coordinated efforts to rectify the mistake. We offered a replacement product for free, along with a 25% discount on their next purchase. Additionally, we added a personalized note to express our apologies and show our appreciation for their patience.
